resources.string: Every sale brings your customer back
The simplest way to sell your products/services and market to your customers to keep them coming back.
Motivate your customers to come back using loyalty programs that gives them reward points every time you sell. You do the selling, we bring the customers back.
Celebrate their birthdays with a message from you & an offer if you choose. Best of all, you don’t have to track the dates. Loystar takes care of it.
It’s never been easier to boost sales on slow days, announce new products & services or invite your customers back with a discount for a festive season.
Designed to be simple, Loystar puts all these powerful features at your fingertips and you can see the effect of your efforts in weekly and monthly reports.
